body:
- [x] Database graph wasn't being built properly; dependencies were set up
  incorrectly in the nodes that ended up in the graph on reindex.
- [x] Reworked _add to increment ref count properly and to always build
  bottom-up to make the logic simpler to understand.
- [x] Better tests.
title: Fixes #1720: spack reindex fails with invalid ref count.
